channel.title: MimiChair on 2021 Design Refresh
channel.description: Recent content in MimiChair on 2021 Design Refresh

item.title: Inspiration
item.description: Week 17: The 4 R’s: Finale. This art was lovingly created using: Toon Boom Harmony. Artist’s Notes I am late but still on time for the showcase Thanks to all the deadline extensions I was still able to make the morphing gif idea I had for this! Because I haven’t been able to draw anything dedicated for Designrefresh at all I decided to do all of them at once on the final week.

item.title: #1 Sour Lemon
item.description: Week 15: Back to Basics. This art was lovingly created using: Adobe Photoshop. Artist’s Notes I actually love the sourness of lemons ~ that is what lemons are known for too. What if we could give an award to a lemon? that would be judged by sourness wouldn’t it ðŸ˜Œ Social Media Instagram: mimichair.art Twitch: mimichair Twitter: mimikuchan Other Edit this page on GitHub .
